titles.title: BVN Verification
titles.subtitle: For regulatory protection of your account, please enter your BVN details

titles.title: Phone Confirmation
titles.subtitle: To alert you about activity on your account, please confirm your phone number

titles.title: National Identity Number
titles.subtitle: Not sure about your NIN number? Dial *346# if you're on MTN/Airtel https://www.nimc.gov.ng/sms-service/

titles.title: Bank Details
titles.subtitle: Enter the bank where we will send your withdrawals to

titles.title: Postal Address
titles.subtitle: Confirm a few details about yourself

titles.title: Employment Details
titles.subtitle: Fill in your employment status and details

titles.title: Investment Preferences
titles.subtitle: Fill in your investment experience and status - required by FINRA, SEC, IRS

titles.title: Uploads
titles.subtitle: Your final step - please upload your Driver's License, Voter's Card, NIMC slip or other national identity document
